metadata.inclusion:
1. Open the [Devices] tab in the homee app
2. Press the plus icon [+] on the top right
3. Select the purple button and press [START]
metadata.exclusion:
1. Go to device settings (tap pencil icon in device detail screen)
2. Press the remove button at the bottom
3. Activate learn mode on the device within 60 seconds
metadata.reset:
1. Open the homee settings (homee icon > gear icon)
2. Navigate to [Cubes] > [Z-Wave]
3. Select [Reset Cube] and confirm

Note: This resets only the Z-Wave cube. Connected devices must be reset manually according to their manuals
